Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{3: 'The royal guards shackled Sophia and brought her to the royal carriage.'}
{3: 'Someone is already waiting in the center of the hall.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'If only everyone who comes to take my life can be as reckless as you...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Well, not that that would be a good thing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "What's up? Your target is standing right here. Aren't you going to say something?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...I don't talk to corpses.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "You have at least four electronic shackles on you. Are you sure I'm going to die today?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "That's okay. I love giving chances to lovely kids.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Aston.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: "Leader, I suggest you think again. We don't know yet...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Aston. I won't say this a third time.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After a series of electronic sounds, Sophia almost immediately feels the shackle on her disappear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1203.jpg'}
{3: 'The next instant, she pulls out a pistol from the hidden holster in her frame and points it at Jamilah.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Why?'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: '...I knew you were inexperienced.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm asking you, why."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'You just gave up the best chance to shoot at me for an answer.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm not asking a third time."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: '...Al...right.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Don't you want to know why there are so many guards today?"}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Did you know?'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Not entirely. I only knew "someone" was coming today.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "But I didn't know it was you."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Do you... Know me?'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I do. You are the only survivor of "that accident". The aristocrats\' report never mentioned you, but I\'ve been looking for you.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'You have no right to mention that "incident"!'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Is that how they told you? That I was the culprit who refused to send reinforcements and caused the death of 47 maintenance members and 336 civilians?'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'What if I tell you another version of the story?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I won't believe in you."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Neither do I think so. Andre told me about your personality in his letter.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...What?'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'The leader of your maintenance squad, Andre. He was my undercover spy in the commoner carriageâ€”one of the best.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "He'd been asking me to find you and take care of you till his last breath."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "That's impossible. They were all...!"}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "They were all dead, weren't they?"}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I hate to remind you of the past... But I hope at least this could make you trust me.'}
{3: 'Jamilah reaches out to Sophia. In her hand is a royal badge with burn marks.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I'm sorry. I could only... Reduce his pain. Morphine was the only thing we could use..."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'The last thing he spoke about was you...'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Why? Aren't you..."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "You don't have to believe this, but it wasn't me."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "...Keep talking. I'll put the gun down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "...That's all I have to say.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'It was that simple. Your hatred just happened to be useful to them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I have evidence. A statement from the waiter in the noble carriage, as well as voice recordings of the escaped technicians.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I see. What have I done...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "It's okay. I don't blame you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I'm a queen with no real power. All I see are illusions. All I can reach is my dressing table.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I can only find you and persuade you one by one, so you can bring me the truth.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I know if I keep doing this, "they" will want me dead sooner or later. Hmm... Maybe there is a different way to put this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I guess I'm just not a good-looking puppet. Or, perhaps... I want to restore things to how they should be, just like my father did.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: 'One day, my leader. One day they will.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "You don't need to say those nice words, Aston. Time waits for no one. Only one side can survive this war.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'But right now, we have only one problem to resolve.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Sophia, if you still want to kill me after hearing all that, you can do it now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Aston, please help Sophia settle. She won't be able to go back to Ashlar after tonight.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Why are you doing this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'As the oldest daughter of the royal family, I had no choice. Whether I liked it or not, my only destiny was to accept the scepter to the throne.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I could have become a tyrant, a wise queen, or a puppet I am now. The scepter couldn't be bothered at all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'But at least I want to make one more person have their choice.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'So when I do something wrong, maybe they can come and tell me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "...I've said enough for the night. Go with Aston. He'll show you your room.", 4: '2'}
